caption.title: Provisional nominations of putative amphid neuronal homologs between C. elegans and P. pacificus.
caption.p: Morphological data based on TEM series of specimens 107 and 148. Features supporting cellular homology include axon projections, lipophilic dye uptake, cell body positions, and chemical synapses to the four first layer amphid interneurons (AIA, AIB, AIY, AIZ) or the AUA. DiI filling neurons in C. elegans are ASI, ASJ, ASK, ADL, ASH, AWB (weak), *ADF (shows only weak FITC uptake, not DiI). DiO filling neurons in C. elegans are ASI, ASJ, ASK, ADL, ASH, AWB. PCMC: periciliary membrane compartment. Structures of C. elegans amphid neurons are available at http://www.wormatlas.org/images/NeuronImageList.jpg.
